limit.name: Maximum reaction roles
limit.description: Specify the maximum amount of reaction roles per a user. 0 = disabled

emoji-list.name: Emoji list
emoji-list.description: Discord Snowflake of the channel where the emoji list should be in. Keep in mind that the bot will treat the channel as a list only, thus, any other messages might be deleted.

emoji-changelog.name: Emoji changelog
emoji-changelog.description: Discord Snowflake of the channel where all emoji changes should be stored in.
